I was fortunate enough to get an opportunity to interview at Google, a company I had admired for years.
ğŸ“Œ Screening Round: Cleared! âœ…
ğŸ“Œ DSA Interviews: Three intense rounds, successfully cracked them all.
ğŸ“Œ Hiring Manager Round: Cleared with positive feedback.

Then came the HR callâ€”the one I had been waiting for. My heart was racing, expecting an offer. Instead, I was told the team had decided not to move forward with my application. No specific reason, no feedbackâ€”just an abrupt end to what had felt like a promising journey.

I reached out to HR, hoping for at least some closure, but my emails went unanswered. After months of effort, it was tough to processâ€”not just the rejection, but the lack of clarity after making it through so many rounds.

It hurt. Not because I didnâ€™t make it, but because after investing so much time and energy, I was left with unanswered questions, definitely not something i was expecting from a company like Google.

PS : Will be sharing my detailed interview experience in my next post.

Elated to present the list of companies that have extended job offers to me
,,,,,,

Throughout this journey, I've come to realise that while possessing valuable skills and knowledge is important, the network I've cultivated over time has proven to be just as crucial in unlocking these opportunities.

I'd like to extend my heartfelt gratitude for the following who provide enriching content free of charge in youtube and other platforms, contributing in my journey of success.
,,,,,,,,,...and many more

A special shout-out goes to my friend, the coding platform, and the professional networkfor playing pivotal roles in guiding me towards the path of success.

Navigating job opportunities might seem daunting, especially now. Yet, remember companies are seeking talent even in these circumstances. By leveraging your network, refining skills, and staying positive, you can overcome challenges and succeed.

For  freshers embarking on their journey, I encourage you to explore my previous post, which contains valuable insights that can greatly assist you in preparing for your upcoming interviews.
